subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joba Chamberlain is eligible to come off the bereavement list Thursday, but Manager Joe Girardi said Chamberlain would miss the series as he tends to his father, Harlan.
snippet: Joba Chamberlain is eligible to come off the bereavement list Thursday, but Manager Joe Girardi said Chamberlain would miss the series as he tends to his father, Harlan.
